subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Raiders made Tom Cable their official head coach, removing the interim designation from his title more than five weeks after their season ended. Cable went 4-8 after replacing Lane Kiffin with the Raiders (5-11), who have lost at least 11 games in six consecutive years.
